experience.title: Global 50 Change Maker for The Human Cloud
experience.description: A Global Change Maker is a leader that uses the Human Cloud to create a world where work, works for everyone through remote, freelance, and automation technologies. The Human Cloud awards 50 outstanding leaders each year the title Global Human Cloud Changemaker. There are no applications, awardee's are nominated by their peers and independently vetted through referrals, proven experience, and tangible outcomes.To learn more:

education.title: Delhi University
education.description: Activities and Societies: NSS Transitioning from the Science stream into Arts wasn't an easy decision (for my parents). But, who can withhold the call of the heart? — Studying Literature taught me that there isn't only one perspective on things. Everything is, in fact, a kaleidoscope - offering numerous views and opinions. All that matters is what is true for you. — Fiction is born from the real socio-economic conditions of the era, the history behind and ideologies working to create a piece of art. —… Show more

education.title: Lancer's Convent School
education.description: Activities and Societies: Music Subjects - Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Computers, English. — Turned me into a disciplined, focused and organized individual.

education.title: Lancer's Convent School
education.description: Activities and Societies: Music (Singing), Writing, Art, Drama, Anchoring, Sports (Throwball/Handball) LCS was where it all started. It provided me the platform to develop my creativity with excellent mentors in every field (study and co-curricular). — My seed for love for English and the written word was sown and nurtured here. I worked closely with the English department and was a part of the School Magazine Editorial Team. — I had active participation in school activities (music, art, sports, etc.) and had the honor of bringing laurels to the school. — It developed the… Show more

recommendations: Julia Pannewitz, PMP “I have been working with Simran for about a year now on an ongoing project with one of our larger clients. She is a very responsive and detailed content writer, always delivering on time and open to client feedback. A pleasure to work with, and I look forward to our next collaboration!”
Devorah Wolf “Simran is a pleasure to work with- she is thorough, fast, and always open to feedback.”
